caption.p: (a) Photoluminescence (PL) spectrum of the Y(OH) 3:Eu 3+ phosphors synthesized for 60 min with different doping ratios. (b) Variation of their corresponding emission peak intensities, labeled with A, B, C, D, and E, with respect to doping ratio. (c) The shift of the 2θ reflection position of 16° with respect to the doping ratio of the particles.
